ml:page.p: MarkLogic User Groups are informal volunteer events for users to meet, discuss, and share best practices regionally. This is an easy way to meet peers and learn how to get more out of MarkLogic Server.
ml:page.h2: Participate in a MarkLogic User Group
ml:page.p: User Group events are free and open to all users, regardless of company affiliation (i. e. expect that competitive companies will be participating together and respecting each othersâ€™ confidentiality). If you want to participate in a user group, you can use the map above or go directly to meetup.com. If there are none in your region, join the general developer mailing list or contact us.
